text.autoconfig.imblocker.title: IMBlocker Config
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.basicSe: Listed screens would enable your IME.
Here lists all recorded Screens for whitelist editing.
§lThe method of setting English state when typing command

If your input method can't auto-switch to English state when typing command,
set this option to "DISABLE_IM" may help,
but note that you can only type English in command in this mode.
§lThe initial English state of the IME when a text field focused.
This option is mainly for Chinese users who are used to search with JECh.
This option doesn't affect chat field and mods with few search scenarios.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.advance: §lLocate the focus owner with char simulation

This approach can locate the focus owner with 100% accuracy.
Generally, the probe char will be safely absorbed by the injection,
however, it might leak to the screen that doesn't filter it.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.windows:
The API that controls the English state.
§7If disabled, IM_ENG_STATE command input mode will not work.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.linuxCo: Apply the patch that prevent non-character keys from being sent to the game while candidates showing

If the candidate window is closed by pre-edit characters being cleared by Backspaces,
the game will not be able to process non-character keys.
In this case, press Esc or type any character to fix it.

To determine it:
Execute "ibus engine <this argument>" command in terminal will enable the IME.

To determine it:
Execute "ibus engine <this argument>" command in terminal will disable the IME.

To determine it:
Execute "fcitx5-remote <this argument>" command in terminal will enable the IME.

To determine it:
Execute "fcitx5-remote <this argument>" command in terminal will disable the IME.

To determine it:
Execute "fcitx5-remote" command in terminal will return <this argument>.
